definitions.definition: The act of secluding , shutting out or keeping apart.
The state of being secluded or shut out , as from company, society, the world, etc.; solitude .
A secluded, isolated or private place.
The mature phase of the extratropical cyclone life cycle .

main_definition: The act of secluding , shutting out or keeping apart.
secondary_definitions: The state of being secluded or shut out , as from company, society, the world, etc.; solitude .
A secluded, isolated or private place.
( meteorology ) The mature phase of the extratropical cyclone life cycle .
